DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research determine participant take `` Crave Crush '' report low craving palatability rating candy compare subject receive placebo . Participants self-selected university student pass table verbally agree participate research study taste preference . Data record anonymously .
DOC.detailed_description: When student approach table , research assistant ask choose favorite kind candy assortment . They ask subject rate crave candy taste . After try candy , research assistant ask rate palatability . Then rate crave another piece candy . A research assistant flip coin determine whether subject receive Crave Crush placebo . While Crave Crush placebo dissolve mouth , student fill short questionnaire identification number . The questionnaire ask age , gender , ethnicity , approximate height weight , question dietary habit . After tablet dissolve , research assistant ask student rate crave another piece candy . Research assistants ask participant would like another piece candy assess palatability . The process offer piece candy ask subject rate palatability occur five time . Finally , subject ask would like take piece candy road say yes , number piece take note . The study activity last 5-10 minute per participant .
DOC.criteria: University student , eaten within last hour , sleep within two hour normal amount
